collections.title: Freestyle Collection
collections.description: Carve up any slope with our complete range of freestyle snowboards, featuring cutting-edge materials and industry-first innovations. With a wide range of cambers and tapers to suit any taste and experience level, you'll find the right board for bunny-hill drifters and veteran shredders alike.

seo.description: Carve up any slope with our complete range of freestyle snowboards, featuring cutting-edge materials and industry-first innovations, perfect for beginners and advanced boarders alike.
seo.title: Freestyle snowboards

image.altText: A snowboarder stands atop a snowy mountain holding his snowboard with the back facing the camera. The snowboard artwork reads Hydrogen, in a script font.

collections.title: Backcountry Collection
collections.description: Go further with our most technologically advanced boards, designed for the most demanding off-piste adventurers. These rocker-style decks are optimized for float and maneuverability so you can chase the freshies beyond all boundaries.

seo.description: Go further with our most technologically advanced rocker-style boards, designed to optimize float and maneuverability for the most demanding off-piste adventurers.
seo.title: Backcountry snowboards

image.altText: A skier hikes up a mountain through the snow with skis over their shoulder.
